Ultra-Compact 10000mAh Portable Charger, Upgraded PowerIQ 2.0 (up to 18W Output)

Charging Specs:

Input: 5V⎓2A, 9V⎓2A (Compatible with Quick Charge / AFC / PowerIQ 2.0)

Output: 5V⎓3A, 9V⎓2A, 12V⎓1.5A (PowerIQ 2.0)

Does not support full-speed charging for some USB-C devices, including Nexus 6P/5X or Google Pixel.

Not compatible with Samsung W700.

SPECIFICATIONS
